backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with product, cart, order, redemption, and user-profile management plus admin bootstrap and access-control logic.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic mapping old actor state to the new format while resetting bootstrapClaimed.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature-evidence metadata mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all major frontend files, including pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps pages in the AppShell layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Handles admin access flow, enforcing II login, admin checks, bootstrap claim, and support info display.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Protects child components by requiring Internet Identity login and shows a login card when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login button using Internet Identity with a loading state indicator.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and saves the profile.
frontend/src/components/layout/AccountSu: Displays user profile info, points, navigation shortcuts, and handles logout via a dropdown menu.
Provides the main layout with header, navigation, footer, and integrates auth-related UI like profile setup and account controls.
frontend/src/components/SupportWhatsAppL: Renders a configurable WhatsApp support button with optional icon and custom message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUnlock.ts: Manages admin unlock state with a hardcoded password stored in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Provides cart queries and mutations for fetching, adding, removing items, and placing orders using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, providing identity state, login, and logout logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Exposes product queries and mutations for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and toggling product active state via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, admin status, bootstrap, points, and related mutations using an Internet Identity actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Provides an admin login form and unlock flow before rendering the admin product management page.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, and toggling products with dialogs and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items, calculates totals and points, and provides item removal and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Shows a searchable, filterable product catalog with category tabs and admin detection.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Displays cart review, calculates totals and points, and handles placing orders with loading and empty-cart states.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows a success message after checkout with links to shop or view rewards.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Placeholder page behind AuthGate indicating order history is coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and displays product details with image carousel and quantity controls, allowing authenticated users to add items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsPage.tsx: Shows the user’s points balance and allows redeeming rewards when enough points are available.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the app’s styling.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state for the Ryk cart e‑commerce app, including admin login issues, required features, architectural notes, and a flag indicating this is a fix request. It outlines functionalities like WhatsApp support, loyalty points, admin panel access, and known access problems.
